StaleMessage:
Sorry to bother you @%s,

but we've detected that this merge request hasn't seen any recent activity. If you need help or want to discuss your approach with developers you can ping `@%s`. You can also ask on IRC on `#alpine-devel` on irc.oftc.net. If no further activity occurs in this MR, Alpine developers may close it in the future.

Thanks for your contribution.
